com.servingxml.expr.substitution
Class MultiPartSubstitutionExpr

java.lang.Object
  com.servingxml.expr.substitution.SubstitutionExpr
      com.servingxml.expr.substitution.MultiPartSubstitutionExpr

public class MultiPartSubstitutionExpr
extends SubstitutionExpr

The MultiPartSubstitutionExpr implements a class that when evaluated concatenates the valueResolvers of its parts.
